    MyRectangle
    public class MyTetragon
extends MyPolygon
    rappresenta un quadrilatero convesso.
    See Also:
    MyPolygon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MyTetragon​(MyPoint2D[] p)
      initializes a tetragon with the specified vertex array

      initializes a tetragon with the specified vertices

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean isEquilateral()
      checks if this tetragon is equilateral (all sides have the same size)
      boolean isParallelogram()
      checks if this tetragon is a parallelogram (the opposite sides have the same size)
      boolean isRectangle()
      checks if this tetragon is a rectangle (it is a parallelogram and the diagonals have the same size)
      boolean isSquare()
      checks if this tetragon is a square (it is equilateral and rectangle)

      • MyTetragon

        public MyTetragon​(MyPoint2D[] p)
        initializes a tetragon with the specified vertex array
        Parameters:
        p - the specified vertex array
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if p is null
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundException - if the array has less than four elements

      • MyTetragon

                  MyPoint2D p2,

        initializes a tetragon with the specified vertices
        Parameters:
        p1 - the first specified vertex
        p2 - the second specified vertex
        p3 - the third specified vertex
        p4 - the forth specified vertex
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the vertices is null

    • Method Detail

      • isParallelogram

        public boolean isParallelogram()
        checks if this tetragon is a parallelogram (the opposite sides have the same size)
        Returns:
        true if this tetragon is a parallelogram, otherwise false

      • isEquilateral

        public boolean isEquilateral()
        checks if this tetragon is equilateral (all sides have the same size)
        Returns:
        true if this tetragon is equilateral, otherwise false

      • isRectangle

        public boolean isRectangle()
        checks if this tetragon is a rectangle (it is a parallelogram and the diagonals have the same size)
        Returns:
        true if this tetragon is a rectangle, otherwise false

      • isSquare

        public boolean isSquare()
        checks if this tetragon is a square (it is equilateral and rectangle)
        Returns:
        true if this tetragon is a square, otherwise false
